description:
Created to handle a wide range of high-output mountain activities, this short-sleeved Cormac is designed for performance comfort. Ostria™, its lightweight gridded fabric, feels great, breathes, wicks moisture and dries fast. Truly versatile, it has a look that easily transitions into daily wear, merrow stitch seams to minimize chafing, and their classic bird logo on the chest.

Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of their commitment to transition 80% of Arc’teryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
name: Arcteryx Cormac Logo SS - Mens
